{"key":"35","highlight":"0","is_holiday":"0","icon":"NAME","festival":\""Swamy Vivekanandara Punya Dina\"","festivalL":\""ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ವಿವೇಕಾನಂದರ ಪುಣ್ಯ ದಿನ \""}

string-array.name: holiday_mapping_arr
string-array.item: {"day":"Monday","date":\""January 01\"","holiday":\""New Year's Day\"","comment":\""Several states\"","lholiday":\""ಹೊಸ ವರುಷದ ದಿನ\"","lcomment":\""ಹಲವು ರಾಜ್ಯಗಳು\""}

{"day":"Friday","date":\""January 05\"","holiday":\""Guru Gobind Singh Jayanti\"","comment":\""Uttar Pradesh, Uttarkhand\"","lholiday":\""ಗುರು ಗೋಬಿಂದ್ ಸಿಂಗ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಉತ್ತರ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, ಉತ್ತರಾಖಂಡ\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""January 12\"","holiday":\""Birthday of Swami Vivekananda\"","comment":\""West Bengal only\"","lholiday":\""ಸ್ವಾಮಿ ವಿವೇಕಾನಂದ ಜನ್ಮದಿನ\"","lcomment":\""ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಬಂಗಾಳ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Sunday","date":\""January 14\"","holiday":\""Pongal\"","comment":\""Also known as Makar Sankranti, Lohri, Bihu, Hadaga, Poki\"","lholiday":\""ಪೊಂಗಲ್\"","lcomment":\""ಅಲ್ಲದೆ ಮಕರ ಸಂಕ್ರಾಂತಿಯ, ಲೋಹ್ರಿ, ಬಿಹು, Hadaga, Poki ಎಂದು ಕರೆಯಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ\""}
{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""January 16\"","holiday":\""Uzhavar Tirunal\"","comment":\""Puducherry, Tamil Nadu only\"","lholiday":\""Uzhavar ತಿರುನಾಳ್\"","lcomment":\""ಪುದುಚೇರಿ, ತಮಿಳುನಾಡು ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""January 17\"","holiday":\""Sonam Lhochar\"","comment":\""Sikkim only. Tamang New Year\"","lholiday":\""ಸೋನಮ್ Lhochar\"","lcomment":\""ಸಿಕ್ಕಿಂ ಮಾತ್ರ. Tamang, ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ\""}

{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""January 23\"","holiday":\""Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose Jayanti\"","comment":\""Assam, Odisha, Tripura, West Bengal. Birthday of a prominent leader in the Indian freedom movement\"","lholiday":\""ನೇತಾಜಿ ಸುಭಾಷ್ ಚಂದ್ರ ಬೋಸ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಅಸ್ಸಾಂ, ಒರಿಸ್ಸಾ, ತ್ರಿಪುರಾ, ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಬಂಗಾಳ. ಇವರು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಪಾತ್ರ ಹುಟ್ಟು ಭಾರತೀಯ ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯ ಚಳುವಳಿಯಿಂದಾಗಿ\""}
{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""January 24\"","holiday":\""Sir Chhotu Ram Jayanti\"","comment":\""Haryana only\"","lholiday":\""ಸರ್ ಛೋಟು ರಾಮ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಹರ್ಯಾಣ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Thursday","date":\""January 25\"","holiday":\""Statehood Day\"","comment":\""Himachal Pradesh only\"","lholiday":\""ಪ್ರಾದೇಶಿಕತೆ ಡೇ\"","lcomment":\""ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Friday","date":\""January 26\"","holiday":\""Republic Day\"","comment":\""Commemorates the establishment of the Constitution of India\"","lholiday":\""ಗಣರಾಜ್ಯೋತ್ಸವ\"","lcomment":\""ಭಾರತದ ಸಂವಿಧಾನ ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆಯ ಸ್ಮರಣೆಗಾಗಿ\""}

{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""January 31\"","holiday":\""Guru Ravidas Birthday\"","comment":\""Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab only. Full moon of Magh\"","lholiday":\""ಗುರು ರವಿದಾಸ್ ಜನ್ಮದಿನ\"","lcomment":\""ಹರಿಯಾಣ, ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, ಪಂಜಾಬ್ ಮಾತ್ರ. ಮಾಘ ಹುಣ್ಣಿಮೆಯ\""}
{"day":"Saturday","date":\""February 10\"","holiday":\""Maharshi Dayanand Saraswati Jayanti\"","comment":\""Haryana only\"","lholiday":\""ಮಹರ್ಷಿ ದಯಾನಂದ ಸರಸ್ವತಿ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಹರ್ಯಾಣ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""February 13\"","holiday":\""Maha Shivratri\"","comment":\""Celebrated on the 13th night/14th day in the Krishna Paksha\"","lholiday":\""ಮಹಾ ಶಿವರಾತ್ರಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಕೃಷ್ಣ ಪಕ್ಷ 13 ನೇ ರಾತ್ರಿ / 14 ದಿನ ಆಚರಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""February 16\"","holiday":\""Losar\"","comment":\""Sikkim only. Tibetan New Year\"","lholiday":\""ಲೋಸರ್\"","lcomment":\""ಸಿಕ್ಕಿಂ ಮಾತ್ರ. ಟಿಬೆಟಿಯನ್ ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ\""}

{"day":"Monday","date":\""February 19\"","holiday":\""Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Jayanti\"","comment":\""Maharashtra only\"","lholiday":\""ಛತ್ರಪತಿ ಶಿವಾಜಿ ಮಹಾರಾಜ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 18\"","holiday":\""Ugadi\"","comment":\""Telugu and Kannada New Year\"","lholiday":\""ಯುಗಾದಿ\"","lcomment":\""ತೆಲುಗು ಮತ್ತು ಕನ್ನಡ ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 18\"","holiday":\""Gudi Padwa\"","comment":\""Telugu and Kannada New Year. Goa\"","lholiday":\""ಗುಡಿ ಪಾಡ್ವ\"","lcomment":\""ತೆಲುಗು ಮತ್ತು ಕನ್ನಡ ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ. ಗೋವಾ\""}

{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 18\"","holiday":\""Sajibu Nongmapanba\"","comment":\""Manipur. 1st day of the Month of Sajibu\"","lholiday":\""Sajibu Nongmapanba\"","lcomment":\""ಮಣಿಪುರ. Sajibu ತಿಂಗಳು 1 ನೇ ದಿನ\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 18\"","holiday":\""1st Navratra\"","comment":\""Jammu and Kashmir only\"","lholiday":\""1 ನೇ ನವರಾತ್ರಿಯ\"","lcomment":\""ಜಮ್ಮು ಮತ್ತು ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""March 21\"","holiday":\""Hazrat Ali's Birthday\"","comment":\""Uttar Pradesh only. Son in law of Prophet Muhammad\"","lholiday":\""ಹಜರತ್ ಅಲಿ ತಂದೆಯ ಜನ್ಮದಿನ\"","lcomment":\""ಉತ್ತರ ಪ್ರದೇಶ ಮಾತ್ರ. ಪ್ರವಾದಿ ಮುಹಮ್ಮದ್ ಅಳಿಯ\""}

{"day":"Friday","date":\""March 23\"","holiday":\""Shaheedi Diwas of Bhagat Singh, Rajguru & Sukhdev\"","comment":\""Haryana only\"","lholiday":\""Shaheedi Diwas ಭಗತ್ ಸಿಂಗ್, ರಾಜಗುರು ಹಾಗೂ ಸುಖ್ದೇವ್ ಆಫ್\"","lcomment":\""ಹರ್ಯಾಣ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""March 23\"","holiday":\""Shahidi Divas S. Bhagat Singh Ji\"","comment":\""Punjab only\"","lholiday":\""Shahidi ದಿವಾಸ್ ಎಸ್ ಭಗತ್ ಸಿಂಗ್ ಜಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಪಂಜಾಬ್ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Saturday","date":\""March 24\"","holiday":\""Ashoka's Birth Anniversary\"","comment":\""Bihar only\"","lholiday":\""ಅಶೋಕರ ಬರ್ತ್ ವಾರ್ಷಿಕೋತ್ಸವ\"","lcomment":\""ಬಿಹಾರ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Sunday","date":\""March 25\"","holiday":\""Ram Navami\"","comment":\""Celebrates the birth of Lord Rama to King Dasharatha of Ayodhya\"","lholiday":\""ರಾಮ ನವಮಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಆಯೋಧ್ಯೆಯ ರಾಜ ದಶರಥ ಗೆ ರಾಮ ದೇವರ ಜನ್ಮ ಆಚರಣೆ\""}

{"day":"Monday","date":\""March 26\"","holiday":\""Sri Rama Navami\"","comment":\""Celebrates the birth of Lord Rama to King Dasharatha of Ayodhya\"","lholiday":\""ಶ್ರೀ ರಾಮ ನವಮಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಆಯೋಧ್ಯೆಯ ರಾಜ ದಶರಥ ಗೆ ರಾಮ ದೇವರ ಜನ್ಮ ಆಚರಣೆ\""}

{"day":"Thursday","date":\""March 29\"","holiday":\""Mahavir Jayanti\"","comment":\""The most important religious holiday in Jainism\"","lholiday":\""ಮಹಾವೀರ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಜೈನ್ ಧರ್ಮ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ರಜಾ\""}
{"day":"Thursday","date":\""March 29\"","holiday":\""Maundy Thursday\"","comment":\""Kerala only\"","lholiday":\""ಈಸ್ಟರ್ ಹಬ್ಬದ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಗುರುವಾರ\"","lcomment":\""ಕೇರಳ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""March 30\"","holiday":\""Good Friday\"","comment":\""Friday before Easter Sunday\"","lholiday":\""ಶುಭ ಶುಕ್ರವಾರ\"","lcomment":\""ಈಸ್ಟರ್ ಭಾನುವಾರದ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಶುಕ್ರವಾರ\""}

{"day":"Sunday","date":\""April 01\"","holiday":\""Bank Holiday\"","comment":\""Banks only. Annual accounts closing\"","lholiday":\""ಬ್ಯಾಂಕ್ ರಜೆ\"","lcomment":\""ಬ್ಯಾಂಕುಗಳು ಮಾತ್ರ. ವಾರ್ಷಿಕ ಖಾತೆಗಳನ್ನು ಮುಚ್ಚುವ\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""April 01\"","holiday":\""Odisha Day\"","comment":\""Odisha only. Utkal Divas\"","lholiday":\""ಒಡಿಶಾ ಡೇ\"","lcomment":\""ಒಡಿಶಾ ಮಾತ್ರ. ಉತ್ಕಲ್ ದಿವಾಸ್\""}

{"day":"Thursday","date":\""April 05\"","holiday":\""Babu Jagjivan Ram Birthday\"","comment":\""Andhra Pradesh, Telangana only\"","lholiday":\""ಬಾಬು ಜಗಜೀವನ್ ರಾಂ ಜನ್ಮದಿನ\"","lcomment":\""ಆಂಧ್ರ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, ತೆಲಂಗಾಣ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""April 13\"","holiday":\""Bohag Bihu Holiday\"","comment":\""Assam only\"","lholiday":\""ಬೋಹಗ್ ಬಿಹು ಹಾಲಿಡೇ\"","lcomment":\""ಅಸ್ಸಾಂ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Saturday","date":\""April 14\"","holiday":\""Bohag Bihu\"","comment":\""Assamese New Year. Arunachal Pradesh, Assam\"","lholiday":\""ಬೋಹಗ್ ಬಿಹು\"","lcomment":\""ಅಸ್ಸಾಂ ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ. ಅರುಣಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, ಅಸ್ಸಾಂ\""}

{"day":"Saturday","date":\""April 14\"","holiday":\""Dr Ambedkar Jayanti\"","comment":\""Birthday of Bhimrao Ramji Ambedekar\"","lholiday":\""ಅಂಬೇಡ್ಕರ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಭೀಮರಾವ್ ರಾಮ್ಜಿ Ambedekar ಹುಟ್ಟು\""}
{"day":"Saturday","date":\""April 14\"","holiday":\""Tamil New Year\"","comment":\""Puthandu. Tamil Nadu only\"","lholiday":\""ತಮಿಳು ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ\"","lcomment":\""ಪುಥಾಂದು. ತಮಿಳುನಾಡು ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""April 15\"","holiday":\""Bengali New Year\"","comment":\""Tripura, West Bengal only\"","lholiday":\""ಬಂಗಾಳಿ ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ\"","lcomment":\""ತ್ರಿಪುರಾ, ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಬಂಗಾಳ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Sunday","date":\""April 15\"","holiday":\""Himachal Day\"","comment":\""Himachal Pradesh only. The province of Himachal Pradesh was created on 15 April 1948\"","lholiday":\""ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಡೇ\"","lcomment":\""ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ ಮಾತ್ರ. ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ ಪ್ರಾಂತ್ಯದ 1948 ಏಪ್ರಿಲ್ 15 ರಂದು ರಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ\""}
{"day":"Sunday","date":\""April 15\"","holiday":\""Vishu\"","comment":\""Kerala Only. First day of Tulu calendar\"","lholiday":\""ವಿಷು\"","lcomment":\""ಕೇರಳ ಮಾತ್ರ. ತುಳು ಕ್ಯಾಲೆಂಡರ್ ಮೊದಲ ದಿನ\""}

{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""April 18\"","holiday":\""Parashurama Jayanti\"","comment":\""Gujarat, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab\"","lholiday":\""ಪರಶುರಾಮ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಗುಜರಾತ್, ಹರಿಯಾಣ, ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, ಪಂಜಾಬ್\""}

{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""April 18\"","holiday":\""Basava Jayanthi\"","comment":\""Karnataka only. The most important festival of the Lingayats. 3rd Vaiskha\"","lholiday":\""ಬಸವ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಕರ್ನಾಟಕ ಮಾತ್ರ. Lingayats ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಉತ್ಸವ. 3 ನೇ Vaiskha\""}

{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""May 01\"","holiday":\""Maharashtra Day\"","comment":\""Maharashtra only. Commemorates the formation of the state of Maharashtra on 1 May 1960\"","lholiday":\""ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಡೇ\"","lcomment":\""ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಮಾತ್ರ. 1960 ಮೇ 1 ರಂದು ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ರಾಜ್ಯವು ರಚನೆಯಾದ ಸ್ಮರಣೆಗಾಗಿ\""}

{"day":"Wednesday","date":\""May 09\"","holiday":\""Birthday of Rabindra Nath Tagore\"","comment":\""Tripura, West Bengal\"","lholiday":\""ರವೀಂದ್ರ ನಾಥ್ ಠಾಕೂರ್ ಹುಟ್ಟು\"","lcomment":\""ತ್ರಿಪುರಾ, ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಬಂಗಾಳ\""}
{"day":"Saturday","date":\""May 26\"","holiday":\""Birthday of Kazi Nazrul Islam\"","comment":\""Tripura only.\"","lholiday":\""ಕಾಜಿ ನಜ್ರುಲ್ ಇಸ್ಲಾಂ ಧರ್ಮ ಹುಟ್ಟು\"","lcomment":\""ತ್ರಿಪುರ ಮಾತ್ರ.\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""June 08\"","holiday":\""Jumat-ul-Wida\"","comment":\""Last Friday of Ramadam\"","lholiday":\""Jumat ಉಲ್ Wida\"","lcomment":\""ಕೊನೆಯ ಶುಕ್ರವಾರ Ramadam ಆಫ್\""}

{"day":"Monday","date":\""June 11\"","holiday":\""Shab-I-Qadar\"","comment":\""Jammu and Kashmir. Celebrated on the 27th day of Ramadan\"","lholiday":\""Shab-ಐ-Qadar\"","lcomment":\""ಜಮ್ಮು ಮತ್ತು ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರ. ರಂಜಾನ್ 27 ನೇ ದಿನ ಆಚರಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ\""}
{"day":"Saturday","date":\""June 16\"","holiday":\""Guru Arjun Dev Martyrdom day\"","comment":\""Punjab Only\"","lholiday":\""ಗುರು ಅರ್ಜುನ್ ದೇವ್ ಹುತಾತ್ಮತೆಯನ್ನು ದಿನ\"","lcomment":\""ಪಂಜಾಬ್ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Saturday","date":\""June 16\"","holiday":\""Maharana Pratap Jayanti\"","comment":\""Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Rajashtan only\"","lholiday":\""ಮಹಾರಾಣಾ ಪ್ರತಾಪ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಹರಿಯಾಣ, ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, Rajashtan ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Thursday","date":\""June 28\"","holiday":\""Sant Guru Kabir Jayanti\"","comment":\""Gazetted holiday in Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab.\"","lholiday":\""ಸಂತ ಗುರು ಕಬೀರ್ ಜಯಂತಿ\"","lcomment":\""ಹರಿಯಾಣ, ಹಿಮಾಚಲ ಪ್ರದೇಶ, ಪಂಜಾಬ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಸರ್ಕಾರಿ ಗೆಜೆಟ್ಟಿನಲ್ಲಿ ರಜಾ.\""}

{"day":"Thursday","date":\""July 05\"","holiday":\""Guru Hargobind Ji's Birthday\"","comment":\""Jammu and Kashmir\"","lholiday":\""ಗುರು ಹರಗೋಬಿಂದ್ ಜಿ ಹುಟ್ಟುಹಬ್ಬದ\"","lcomment":\""ಜಮ್ಮು ಮತ್ತು ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರ\""}
{"day":"Friday","date":\""July 13\"","holiday":\""Martyr's Day\"","comment":\""Jammu and Kashmir only\"","lholiday":\""ಹುತಾತ್ಮರ ದಿನವೆಂದು\"","lcomment":\""ಜಮ್ಮು ಮತ್ತು ಕಾಶ್ಮೀರ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Tuesday","date":\""July 31\"","holiday":\""Martyrdom Day of Shaheed Udham Singh\"","comment":\""Haryana, Punjab only\"","lholiday":\""ಶಹೀದ್ ಉಧಮ್ ಸಿಂಗ್ ಹುತಾತ್ಮರಾದ ದಿನದ\"","lcomment":\""ಹರಿಯಾಣ, ಪಂಜಾಬ್ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}

{"day":"Friday","date":\""August 17\"","holiday":\""Parsi New Year\"","comment":\""Jamshed Navroz. Gujarat, Mumbai Only\"","lholiday":\""ಪಾರ್ಸಿ ಹೊಸ ವರ್ಷದ\"","lcomment":\""ಜಮ್ಷೆಡ್ Navroz. ಗುಜರಾತ್, ಮುಂಬೈ ಮಾತ್ರ\""}
